list_definition.definition: an oily substance made by the bodies of animals and by some plants

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This meat has got a lot of fat on it.

list_definition.definition: a kind of such substance, used especially for cooking

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There are several good cooking fats on the market.

list_definition.definition: having a lot of fat on one’s body; large, heavy and round in shape

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was a very fat child.

list_definition.mean_english: nhiều về số lượng; giá trị

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her business made a fat profit
A fat lot of good that is! (= That is no good at all)
